"...This is amazing. Buildings as far as: "So, people lived in each one of them?"
"What kind of place was this, anyways?"
"This is a former base of operations for the Resurgent ARKS."
"You are looking at its residential district."
"This place branches out into various different sectors."
"One of them being the underground facility we're heading to."
"Did Zephetto give you that information as well?"
"He did. It's rather fragmented, though."
"With a place this huge, I wonder why it wasn't discovered earlier?"
"That's because this place is far from Halpha."
"Where exactly are we right now?"
"...How far away?"

"While the exact coordinates aren't clear,
we are above Halpha... in outer space."
"Outer... space?"

"You know when you look up at the sky at night and you
see the stars twinkling? That's where we are right now."

"But considering the teleporter's power output,
we couldn't be that far away... right?"
"Correct."
"And yet Leciel's surveillance network wasn't able to detect this place..."
"Perhaps there's an exterior cloaking mechanism that obscures it from detection?"
"But why, though?"
"Hey, um... You getting any of this?"
"Kind of."
"Not at all..."
"Now that you mention it, this place is..."
"Huh? Really? Wow..."
"Y-Yeah..."
"What is it?"
"...Oh, sorry... Kind of zoned out for a second."
"...Just now..."
"Come on, you've gotta listen carefully."
"Huh? What?"
"...Hm? Something the matter, you two?"
"Huh? Oh, it's nothing. Please continue."
"R-Right then..."
"It's safe to say that Zephetto kept this place hidden."
"Not just from the people of Halpha, but from us as well."
"So... You think he might've been hiding something?"
"Indeed."
"That's my hypothesis, anyways."
"Faria, do you know anything about the area we're going to?"
"No. I was only made aware of the route leading there."
"I have only the image of a simple map in my mind. Nothing specific."
"Figures..."
"Zephetto wouldn't lead us into some kind of trap, right?"
"...You never really know with him."
"But we'd best err on the side of caution and be ready for anything."
"...Got it."
